meanings.definition: Weakened in the ability to fight off infections or diseases.
meanings.sent1: The immunosuppressed patient needed extra care to avoid getting sick.
meanings.sent2: It is important to protect immunosuppressed individuals from exposure to germs.
meanings.sent3: The immunosuppressed cat wore a tiny mask to stay healthy.
meanings.sent4: Her immune system, like a sleeping dragon, lay immunosuppressed and vulnerable.
meanings.sent5: The immunosuppressed garden struggled to fend off invading pests.

meanings.definition: A person who has a reduced immune response.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed medication to help the immunosuppressed.
meanings.sent2: An immunosuppressed individual may need to take extra precautions.
meanings.sent3: The immunosuppressed student always carried hand sanitizer.
meanings.sent4: She felt like an immunosuppressed warrior, battling every cold that came her way.
meanings.sent5: The immunosuppressed soldier fought bravely against any invading illnesses.
